boat.construction_details: Pitch pine on oak, cascover sheathed
boat.full_description:
'Astrid' was converted to Bermudan before 1976, with a 42' mast, and converted back to gaff in 1980. She was re-rigged in 2000 after the mast broke.

The cabin was refitted in 1980-83 and the engine replaced in 2000 (was BMC 2.2 Diesel) with tiller steering from opposed worm wheel.
boat.name: Lutine
boat.short_description: Built in 1939, 'Astrid' had been converted to Bermudan rig and back to gaff.
